name: Rock Paper Scissors RTS
description:
Theme: Rock Paper Scissors.

Rock Paper Scissors RTS is a real time strategy game featuring Rock catapults, Paper printers that treat Rock catapults just like your printer treats you, and Scissor flotillas ready to slice and dice.

Capture all the territories between your tower(s) and your opponent's tower(s) to win.

Choose which unit you will spawn carefully, it's win or lose with Rock Paper Scissors RTS.

If you think that you're skilled, there is a challenging map awaiting you: Ancient.

----------

Development:

This is my first time participating in a game jam and I had a few goals when I started:

  • Complete first Game Jam.
  • Become familiar with Unreal Engine.
  • Complete "code" using only blueprints.
  • Create a fun game.

In my first week of using Unreal Engine I believe I covered a lot. Hopefully the game is a bit of fun for you!

Credit: I am the sole Game developer, designer, and artist for this game.

The music used for the game belongs to: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku.

Process:

I developed the art assets first in MagicaVoxel then imported into Blender and finally imported into Unreal Engine. All of the game logic is done using Unreal Engine's blueprints and editor.

----------

Instructions to play:

Start the game through RockPaperScissors.exe and select the Arena level to learn the game.
